name: myChaldea
description: Full stack application for the mobile game Fate/GO. This app allows you to add your favorite characters from the game to your account, prioritize skill levels for each character, tracks how many materials you require for each priority, and also tracks upcoming events where you can gather more characters and materials.
features: Database which stores and maintains user and game data.
API that handles requests from the URL to query the database and return a JSON.
Performs complex logic that ascertains priority based upon selected skills of each character tied to an account.
Customizable character icons and backgrounds which are saved to each account.

name: Portfolio
description: Portfolio to display my projects, skills, and previous work experience for front end development.
features: The web app uses public JSON files to display update sections (experience, skills, projects, etc) without the need to rebuild & redeploy.
Ability to directly contact via email.
Access to download my latest resume.

name: D-Weather
description: Displays 7-day weather forecast upon searching a location.
features: Utilizes a third party API to retrieve weather information.
Able to convert temperature between Fahrenheit & Celsius.
Can select a specific day to view more weather information for that particular day.

name: Game of Thrones Houses
description: Showcases house & character info on the major houses from the pop series Game of Thrones.

tech.name: An API of Ice And Fire

features: Retrieves house & character info from a third party API.
Design changes themes upon house selection.
